description.translate: The gold, lost in the pearly horizon, tightens and yellows to gain the darkness that is beginning to dawn.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Fuite bleu\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7L'or, perdu dans l'horizon nacré, se resserre\"}","{\"text\":\"§7et jaunit pour gagner l'obscurité qui commence à poindre.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7The gold, lost in the pearly horizon, tightens and\"}","{\"text\":\"§7yellows to gain the darkness that is beginning to dawn.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7RES§a1 §7HER§a1 §7LUC§a1\"}"]}}
